turn_rules.investigate_resolution: All Investigate missions resolve simultaneously at the end of Phase 1.
turn_rules.cancellation_rule: During the Mid-Turn Reaction Window, players may cancel previously assigned Committed Missions; resources spent are lost.
turn_rules.resolution_timing: At the end of Phase 2, all remaining Committed Missions and all Quick Reaction missions resolve simultaneously.

success_tiers.critical_success: Roll exceeds DC by 10 or more; grants a significant bonus defined per mission.
success_tiers.critical_failure: Natural 1 on d10; negative consequence defined per mission.

outcomes.critical_success: Public Opinion increases by a large amount (e.g., +15). Faction receives a 'Golden Opportunity' token.
outcomes.success: Public Opinion increases by a standard amount (e.g., +5).
outcomes.critical_failure: Public Opinion for your faction decreases; possible negative trait gain.

outcomes.critical_success: Seize one Control Point. Rival faction loses Public Opinion in the nation.
outcomes.critical_failure: Mission fails; attacker is Detained for one turn and their faction loses Public Opinion.

outcomes.critical_success: Seize the Organization. Defending Councillor is Detained.
outcomes.critical_failure: Mission fails; attacker is Detained and gains the Marked trait.

outcomes.critical_success: Learn target's Profession, all Attributes, all Traits, and their current-turn Org income.
outcomes.success: Learn the Committed Mission the target is currently assigned to this turn.
outcomes.failure: Learn nothing; target senses they are being watched.
outcomes.critical_failure: Target is notified of exactly who investigated them.

notes: Resolves with other Investigate missions at end of Phase 1.

outcomes.success: If the protected asset is targeted by a hostile mission this turn, use the protector's Security + d10 in place of the asset's normal DC.
outcomes.failure: No effect if the asset is not targeted this turn.

notes: Protects one asset (controlled CP, controlled Org, or Councillor) for one turn.

outcomes.success: Councillor is hidden this turn. Any hostile mission targeting this Councillor that relies on an opposed Investigation or Espionage roll takes a -10 penalty.

notes: Councillor cannot perform other actions this turn.

modifiers.name: Ideological Modifier vs adjacent opposing axis

outcomes.success: Target is Turned. At the start of the next turn's Intel Phase, receive a full, accurate report of all missions assigned by the target's entire faction.
outcomes.failure: Attacking Councillor is immediately Detained for one turn.
outcomes.critical_failure: Target's faction receives a free Investigate Councillor (Critical Success outcome) against any one Councillor of the attacker's choice.

outcomes.critical_success: Apply a 2.5x multiplier to faction's total passive Research generation for this turn (3.0x if on-station at a Hab).
outcomes.success: Apply a 1.5x multiplier to faction's total passive Research generation for this turn (2.0x if on-station at a Hab).
outcomes.critical_failure: A small amount of accumulated research on the project is lost.

notes: If performed on-station at a Hab, add +0.5x to the multiplier at each success tier.

outcomes.success: Add a large flat amount of Research (e.g., +50) to the targeted Global Project.
outcomes.critical_failure: Mission fails; the leading Councillor is Detained for one turn.

check.defender_context: Defender is the target faction's Project Manager.

outcomes.success: A significant amount of Research is destroyed from the target's project. Attacker is revealed.
outcomes.failure: Attempt is thwarted. Attacker is revealed.
outcomes.critical_failure: Attempt thwarted; attacking Councillor is Detained for one turn.

check.defender_context: Defender is the target faction's Project Manager.

outcomes.success: A portion of Research is stolen from the target's project and added to your active project. Attacker is revealed.
outcomes.failure: Attempt is thwarted. Attacker is revealed.
outcomes.critical_failure: Attempt thwarted; attacking Councillor gains the Marked negative trait.

outcomes.success: A new Hab Core is successfully established in the target orbit.
outcomes.failure: Launch fails; all resources are lost.
outcomes.critical_failure: Catastrophic failure; all resources lost and the Faction Project to build the Hab must be researched again.

outcomes.success: Councillor's location changes from Earth to the target Hab. Considered on-station starting next turn.

validation_rules: Determine Effective Ship Performance from Ship Class and Faction Propulsion Tech.
Calculate transfer Δv cost and travel time for High-Thrust, Hohmann, or Gravity Assist as applicable.
Validate Effective Δv Budget is sufficient for the chosen maneuver.

outcomes.success: Transfer is queued per plan; ship begins maneuver per calculated travel time.
outcomes.failure: If validation fails (insufficient Δv), cannot commit.

prerequisites: Valid ship_id and route; sufficient Δv budget
notes: Inputs: start_location, destination, optional flyby_location, ship_id, departure_month.
Costs in space resources and time are handled by the transfer planner and ship systems, not a dice check.
